unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!

unnormalised: Hey students! Forget slogging through endless college websites – scholarship portals are seriously leveling up the education game. Think of them as a digital biryani – a delicious mix of opportunities!
normalised: Hey students! Forget slogging through endless college websites – scholarship portals are seriously leveling up the education game. Think of them as a digital biryani – a delicious mix of opportunities!

unnormalised: These platforms, like "VidyaDhan" and "ShikshaSaarthi," are connecting students with everything from merit-based grants to need-based financial aid. Imagine landing a scholarship just in time for Onam celebrations – more cash for payasam!
normalised: These platforms, like "VidyaDhan" and "ShikshaSaarthi," are connecting students with everything from merit-based grants to need-based financial aid. Imagine landing a scholarship just in time for Onam celebrations – more cash for payasam!

unnormalised: They're popping up everywhere, helping students across India, from IIT-Delhi hopefuls to aspiring artists in Kerala. One report estimates these portals facilitated over Rs. 50 crore in scholarships in the last year alone.
normalised: They're popping up everywhere, helping students across India, from I I T dash Delhi hopefuls to aspiring artists in Kerala. One report estimates these portals facilitated over rupee fifty crore in scholarships in the last year alone.

unnormalised: Plus, they're not just for college! Some even offer resources for students starting as early as class 8. So, ditch the chai break and spend 15 minutes browsing – it could be your key to unlocking educational dreams. No more begging your parents for extra tuition money! Time to level up your knowledge and bank balance!
